content: squill is a floral-inspired lace crochet shawl the pattern is charted and written out for ease of making **finished measurements** approximately 73 / 185 cm across x 24 / 61 cm down center **yarn** berroco fika 1 100 grs 3 hanks #7017 confetti **hooks and notions** crochet hook size f / 3 75 mm or size to obtain gauge **gauge** pattern repeat as shown on chart measures 5 / 12 5 cm wide and 3¼ / 8 5 cm tall 1 https //www berroco com/yarns/berroco-fika
